SAIT WBDV

Web Developer Fast Track - Winter 2021

Terminology

Source: AcmeThemes

First Contentful Paint (FCP)

The first content that is rendered on the screen when users browse the website. It measures the time from navigation to the time when the browser renders the first piece of content defined in the Document Object Model (DOM). This can be text, an image or canvas render.</dd>

First Meaningful Paint (FMP)

The primary content of the page is visible. After the first meaningful paint render, it gives meaningful information to the users.</dd> </dl>

Image Performance

See: Squoosh Image Optimizer

Images make up at 50% of the data downloaded for an average page. Optimizing these images is often the easiest way to speed up page performance.

Source: Image compression deep-dive
